attributes.action: allow those made bankrupt to keep their home untill their youngest child reaches 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just because a parent is in debt it doesnt mean a child should be uprooted from their home and should suffer such poverty as a result. A far better solution would be to allow a parent to stay in the house as long as a sufficient repayment structure is in place. when the youngest child reaches 16 or eighteen if the debt has not been repaid then the home maybe soild for equity(...probably alot more equity will be available then anyway!) albeit a long winded solution it keep kids within a family
